title: Big Buck Bunny
description: Three rodents amuse themselves by harassing creatures of the forest. However, when they mess with a bunny, he decides to teach them a lesson.

title: Sintel
description: A lonely young woman, Sintel, helps and befriends a dragon, whom she calls Scales. But when he is kidnapped by an adult dragon, Sintel decides to embark on a dangerous quest to find her lost friend Scales.

title: Tears of Steel
description: In an apocalyptic future, a group of soldiers and scientists takes refuge in Amsterdam to try to stop an army of robots that threatens the planet.

title: Elephant's Dream
description: Friends Proog and Emo journey inside the folds of a seemingly infinite Machine, exploring the dark and twisted complex of wires, gears, and cogs, until a moment of conflict negates all their assumptions.

title: The Boy, the Mole, the Fox and the Horse
description: Follows a boy, a mole, a fox and a horse, as they create an unexpected friendship and travel together in the boy's search for home.

title: Arcane
description: Set in Utopian Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, the story follows the origins of two iconic League Of Legends champions and the power that will tear them apart.

title: Food Wars: Shokugeki no Soma
description: Soma Yukihira enrolls in an elite culinary school to become a full-time chef and surpass his father's culinary skills.

title: Dota: Dragon's Blood
description: After encounters with a dragon and a princess on her own mission, a Dragon Knight becomes embroiled in events larger than he could have ever imagined.

title: Indiana Jones and the Dial of Destiny
description: Archaeologist Indiana Jones races against time to retrieve a legendary artifact that can change the course of history.

title: Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour
description: Experience the breathtaking Eras Tour concert, performed by the one and only Taylor Swift.

title: Taylor Swift: Reputation Stadium Tour
description: Taylor Swift takes the stage and proves she doesn't care about her bad reputation.

title: Taylor Swift: The 1989 World Tour Live
description: Filmed in front of 76,000 fans at the ANZ Stadium in Sydney, Australia, "The 1989 World Tour Live" captures Taylor Swift's entire performance while also mixing in behind-the-scene, rehearsal, and special guest footage from her 1989 Tour.

title: Miss Americana
description: A look at iconic pop artist Taylor Swift during a transformational time in her life as she embraces her role as a singer/songwriter and harnesses the full power of her voice.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
description: The Avengers must stop Thanos, an intergalactic warlord, from getting his hands on all the infinity stones. However, Thanos is prepared to go to any lengths to carry out his insane plan.

title: Ratatouille
description: Remy, a rat, aspires to become a renowned French chef. However, he fails to realise that people despise rodents and will never enjoy a meal cooked by him.

title: A Star is Born
description: After falling in love with struggling artist Ally, Jackson, a musician, coaxes her to follow her dreams, while he battles with alcoholism and his personal demons.

title: Finding Dory
description: With vague memories of her past, an amnesiac blue tang fish, Dory, sets off in search of her long-lost parents with the help of her friends, clownfish Marlin and his son Nemo.

title: Coco
description: Despite his family's generations-old ban on music, young Miguel dreams of becoming an accomplished musician like his idol Ernesto de la Cruz. Desperate to prove his talent, Miguel finds himself in the stunning and colorful Land of the Dead. After meeting a charming trickster named HÃ©ctor, the two new friends embark on an extraordinary journey to unlock the real story behind Miguel's family history.

title: Call Me by Your Name
description: Elio, a teenager, develops feelings for Oliver, his father's temporary assistant. Although their relationship is temporary, Elio realises his sexual orientation and tries to come to terms with it.

title: Toy Story 4
description: Woody attempts to make Forky, a toy, suffering from existential crisis, realise his importance in the life of Bonnie, their owner. However, things become difficult when Gabby Gabby enters their lives.

title: Up
description: Carl, an old widower, goes off on an adventure with the help of Russell, a boy scout, in his flying house to search for Paradise Falls, his wife's dream destination.
